# SEQ26 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 26 focuses on inside, attach necessary minor rooms and alcoves

## Category
Buildings

## Patterns
apl190, apl191, apl192, apl193, apl194, apl195, apl196

## Emergent Phenomena
Secondary spaces that support the main activities without overwhelming them

## Overview
This sequence contains 7 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
